insert into doll_cart (user_id, session_id, goods_id, goods_sn, goods_name, market_price, goods_price, member_goods_price, goods_num, spec_key, spec_key_name, bar_code, selected, add_time, prom_type, prom_id, sku) values (#{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sessionId,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{goodsId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{goodsSn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{goodsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{marketPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{goodsPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{memberGoodsPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{goodsNum,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{specKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{specKeyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{barCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{selected,jdbcType=BIT}, #{addTime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{promType,jdbcType=BIT}, #{promId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sku,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update doll_cart set user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, session_id = #{sessionId,jdbcType=CHAR}, goods_id = #{goodsId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, goods_sn = #{goodsSn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, goods_name = #{goodsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, market_price = #{marketPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, goods_price = #{goodsPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, member_goods_price = #{memberGoodsPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, goods_num = #{goodsNum,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, spec_key = #{specKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, spec_key_name = #{specKeyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bar_code = #{barCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, selected = #{selected,jdbcType=BIT}, add_time = #{addTime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, prom_type = #{promType,jdbcType=BIT}, prom_id = #{promId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, sku = #{sku,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
